general.about:
Hello there! I'm Rafael, a dedicated web developer with a strong focus on blockchain and Web3 technologies. With over three years of experience in the field, I'm passionate about learning new technologies. Proficient in React and Solidity, I'm committed to building innovative and secure solutions. Experienced in important protocols in the space.\
\
Current preferred stack:

Frontend - Web3:

* React + Typescript

* Tailwindcss + Shadcn UI

* Viem + Wagmi  + RainbowKit

* Vite

* Biome

Blockchain - Solidity:

* Hardhat + Hardhat-deploy

* Mocha + Chai + Typescript

* Solhint

* Slither

sideProjects.heading: BlockToWin
sideProjects.description: Platform that allows you to submit documents through Binance Smart Chain and IPFS, so you can easily verify if your document is unique.
sideProjects.title: BlockToWin

sideProjects.heading: NFT Marketplace
sideProjects.description:
Simple NFT (ERC-721 and ERC-1155) Marketplace that you can buy and sell NFTs

Highlighted feature: accept offers with NFTs using NFT20
sideProjects.title: NFT Marketplace

sideProjects.heading: ChocoStaker
sideProjects.description: A staking contract based on MasterChef from Sushiswap
sideProjects.title: ChocoStaker

workExperience.heading: Blockchain Developer at CUB3
workExperience.description:
I served and cooperated in mutiple projects as part-time:

* Developed fun blockchain puzzle game, once 9 tiles puzzle is completed, you won a prize

* Developed a NFT marketplace and integrated Shopify to buy NFT via Shopify

* Researched on Flow blockchain implementation

Development Stack:

* Frontend: Next.js, Typescript, Tailwindcss, Ethers.js, Web3React

* Backend: Node.js, Typescript, Hapi.js, Prisma, Piñata, Magic Link, Shopify API, Ethers.js

* Blockchain: Hardhat, Ethers.js, Typescript, hardhat-deploy
workExperience.title: Blockchain Developer

education.heading: Computer Engineering at Universidad Politécnica Territorial de los Llanos (UPTLL) "Juana Ramírez"
education.school: Universidad Politécnica Territorial de los Llanos (UPTLL) "Juana Ramírez"

items.heading: Blockchain Developer at Nuklai
items.description:
Nuklai Marketplace:

* Collaborated with frontend team to implement new designs, add new features, and maintaining platform

* Added tests, maintaining and added new features to V2 smart contracts

Nuklai Bitcoin Campaign:

* Worked together with team to implement designs, features...

* Wrote, tested and deployed smart contract to fetch BTC/USD using Chainlink Oracle and Chainlink Automation's Upkeep

Nuklai Wallet:

* Collaborated with frontend team to implement new designs

* Integrated SDK and VM based on Avalanche subnet
items.title: Blockchain Developer

items.heading: Blockchain Developer at AllianceBlock
items.description:
Bridge: served as a Web3 developer on the Bridge project

* For Bridge V1, served as a maintainer by fixing common issues, and adding some new features

* For Bridge V2, implemented most of the V2 designs and adding new features

LMaaS: served as a Web3 developer, maintaining frontend for client and admin side

DataTunnel: served as a Web3/Blockchain developer

* Maintained frontend in general

* Collaborated with frontend team to implement new designs for DataTunnel

* Added tests, maintained and added new features to already developed V2 smart contracts
items.title: Blockchain Developer
